name: Creature from the Void
description:
Collect the fruit to banish the creature back to the treasure chest from which it emerged. But don't let it catch you and be careful of your sanity for it will drive you mad.

Goals collect all pieces of fruit. The more you play the harder the enemy will be to see.

End the curse or be ended by it. 

Made By: SCushman BSG / Caboose19 BSG
